import React from "react"; import '../CSS/Upload.css' function Upload(){ return(

Upload your article

Guide

1. Navigate to the page where the Upload component is located.
2.Click on the "Choose File" button in the upload form.
3.Select the PDF file you want to upload from your computer.
4.Enter a title and category for the PDF in the corresponding text fields.
5.Click the "Upload" button to submit the form.
6.Wait for the file to finish uploading.

); } export default Upload;
